about_the_game:
Go behind the scenes in the creation of Juanito Arcade Mayhem, from inspirations and concept art until we reached the final results. Game Ever takes you through the ages, from back when Juanito was still the protagonist in his own animated film to the point when he turned into a videogame character.

You can find it in the folder Program Files> Steam> steamapps> common> Juanito Arcade Mayhem.
